commands.name: az maintenance configuration create
commands.syntax:
az maintenance configuration create --name
                                    --resource-group
                                    [--duration]
                                    [--expiration-date-time]
                                    [--extension-properties]
                                    [--install-patches-linux-parameters]
                                    [--install-patches-windows-parameters]
                                    [--location]
                                    [--maintenance-scope {Extension, Host, InGuestPatch, OSImage, Resource, SQLDB, SQLManagedInstance}]
                                    [--maintenance-window-recur-every]
                                    [--maintenance-window-start-date-time]
                                    [--maintenance-window-time-zone]
                                    [--namespace]
                                    [--reboot-setting {Always, IfRequired, Never}]
                                    [--tags]
                                    [--visibility {Custom, Public}]
examples: az maintenance configuration create --location "westus2" --maintenance-scope "OSImage" --maintenance-window-duration "05:00" --maintenance-window-expiration-date-time "9999-12-31 00:00" --maintenance-window-recur-every "Day" --maintenance-window-start-date-time "2020-04-30 08:00" --maintenance-window-time-zone "Pacific Standard Time" --namespace "Microsoft.Maintenance" --visibility "Custom" --resource-group "examplerg" --resource-name "configuration1"

commands.name: az maintenance configuration list
commands.summary: List Configuration records within a subscription and resource group.

commands.name: az maintenance configuration update
commands.syntax:
az maintenance configuration update [--duration]
                                    [--expiration-date-time]
                                    [--extension-properties]
                                    [--ids]
                                    [--install-patches-linux-parameters]
                                    [--install-patches-windows-parameters]
                                    [--location]
                                    [--maintenance-scope {Extension, Host, InGuestPatch, OSImage, Resource, SQLDB, SQLManagedInstance}]
                                    [--maintenance-window-recur-every]
                                    [--maintenance-window-start-date-time]
                                    [--maintenance-window-time-zone]
                                    [--name]
                                    [--namespace]
                                    [--reboot-setting {Always, IfRequired, Never}]
                                    [--resource-group]
                                    [--subscription]
                                    [--tags]
                                    [--visibility {Custom, Public}]
examples: az maintenance configuration update --location "westus2" --maintenance-scope "OSImage" --maintenance-window-duration "05:00" --maintenance-window-expiration-date-time "9999-12-31 00:00" --maintenance-window-recur-every "Month Third Sunday" --maintenance-window-start-date-time "2020-04-30 08:00" --maintenance-window-time-zone "Pacific Standard Time" --namespace "Microsoft.Maintenance" --visibility "Custom" --resource-group "examplerg" --resource-name "configuration1"
